DOC.brief_summary: To determine if there is a difference between wireless ECG and wired ECG findings.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of a Novel 12-Lead Wireless Electrocardiogram (ECG) and a Standard Wired ECG
DOC.detailed_description: The aim of the study is to compare ECG recordings from the Signalife Fidelity 100 Wireless 12-lead ECG Monitor System to that of the GE 5000 Wired 12-lead ECG Monitor System during rest and while walking. We hypothesize that ECG recordings from the wireless system will be equivalent to recordings from the standard wired system.
DOC.criteria: Healthy individuals, AND Age 1864 Pregnant women, Prisoners, Have known cardiovascular disease, OR Do not pass the PARQ and/or show baseline ECG abnormalities.
